title: Ticket #4404: Add the FLOCK_TO and FLOCK_FROM examples back to the config
description: Lets add the comment-block and examples for FLOCK_TO and FLOCK_FROM back into the default condor_config file we install with both tarballs, RPMs, and DEBs. These are referenced by the use security : host_based metaknob, but yet they are not really documented in the manual cuz they are macros, not first-class knobs.
check_ins: 2014-Jul-28 20:00   Check-in [40771]: add comments for FLOCK_TO and FLOCK_FROM to condor_config.generic #4404 these macros provide a way to customize use SECURITY : HOST_BASED ===VersionHistory:None=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: tannenba
